EmailTemplate.subject: Philadelphia Inquirer - Vacation VR/VA No digital
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello, {!Contact.FirstName}:
Unfortunately your account is currently inactive. If an account is inactive, the digital replica edition will not be available to your during that time.
If you wish to start a digital only subscription please contact Customer Service at: 215-222-2765.
